ppl bday Manual Page

Name

ppl bday - Set a contact’s birthday

Synopsis

ppl bday <contact> <date>

Description

Stores the given date as the date of birth of the specified contact. The <contact> parameter must correspond to the ID of an existing contact in the address book. The <date> parameter must be a valid date string parseable by Ruby’s Date.parse function.

Examples

ppl bday jdoe 1970-01-01

See Also

Date.parse
